project.name: Antigravity Manager
project.tagline: Professional AI Account Manager & API Gateway
project.description: A full-featured desktop application for AI developers. Manage multiple Google/Anthropic accounts, convert Web Sessions to standard APIs, and enjoy intelligent request routing with automatic failover. Built with Tauri v2 + React (Rust).

features.title: Why Antigravity Manager?
features.subtitle: Your personal high-performance AI dispatch gateway. Not just account management, but the ultimate solution for breaking API call barriers.

list.title: Smart Dashboard
list.desc: Real-time monitoring of all account health status, including quota for Gemini Pro, Flash, Claude, and Imagen. One-click switch to the best account.

list.title: Multi-Protocol Support
list.desc: Full protocol adaptation: OpenAI /v1/chat/completions, Anthropic /v1/messages, and native Gemini SDK. Compatible with 99% of AI applications.

list.title: Intelligent Routing
list.desc: Smart model routing with tiered priority based on account type (Ultra/Pro/Free). Automatic failover on 429/401 errors with millisecond-level retry.

list.title: OAuth 2.0 Authentication
list.desc: Seamless OAuth flow with pre-generated authorization links. Support for batch import and automatic migration from legacy versions.

list.title: Imagen 3 Support
list.desc: Advanced image generation with quality control. Support for custom size parameters and up to 100MB payload for 4K image recognition.

list.title: Cross-Platform
list.desc: Native desktop app for macOS, Windows, and Linux. Docker deployment available for NAS/servers with noVNC web access.
